plugin.name: Core Mod
plugin.description: Welcome! You are about to install Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul. After selecting your preferences on the following pages, you still have to create the SkyProc patch "Requiem for the Indifferent" as it was explained in the installation guide in our wiki.

plugin.name: Kingthings Petrock
plugin.description:
Install the Kingthings Petrock font, the traditional Requiem font.
Does not support non-latin languages.

plugin.name: Use current font
plugin.description: Do not install any font files and use the standard Skyrim font or whichever font mod you have installed.

plugin.name: Hide Activate Button
plugin.description: Hide the button icon next to interaction tooltips like "talk to".

plugin.name: No Overencumbered Messages
plugin.description: Being overencumbered will not trigger the recurring notifications.

plugin.name: Restored Rewarding Sounds
plugin.description: Requiem disables the sound notifications for level-ups and similar events. Install this plugin if you want to keep the sound notifications from Vanilla Skyrim.

plugin.name: Restored Saving Messages
plugin.description: Enable this optional plugin if you want to get a notification text to confirm your save and load operations.
